Description:
A STUNNING START
The impressive street appeal of this wonderfully charming cottage style home affords only a glimpse of what this special residence has on offer. Brimming with style, elegance and a host of luxuries, you will be enchanted the moment you arrive. An immaculate renovation to the original weatherboard character home has left no stone unturned with quality carpets, window furnishings and stunning timber flooring offset against a neutral palette and warm timber features throughout.
Accommodation comprises three well sized bedrooms all with robes serviced by a beautifully designed central bathroom with deep-set bath and shower with exquisite tiles. The master bedroom features a luxurious walk in robe and a gleaming ensuite with chic vanity making this parents retreat the envy of all your friends. Additionally, at the front of the home is an open plan study with built in work benches perfect for setting up the kids with their homework or an ideal place to work from home.
Flooded with natural light that reflects off the beautiful whitewashed timber floors, the central living and dining zone provides an inviting space to enjoy a movie or enjoy communal meals. The impressive gourmet kitchen is adjacent and will thrill the chef of the house with high-end fittings throughout including striking stone bench tops, dual black/stainless steel ovens and double Fisher and Paykel dishwasher draws. Its simply a delightful place to cook up a storm or enjoy a morning brew at the breakfast bar.
This welcoming space with garden views opens on to an inviting sunny deck via expansive sliding doors so you can further extend your living area. Morning coffees in the sunshine, BBQs with friends and watching your children play are all yours to enjoy from this lovely alfresco area. There is also a further garden space at the front of the home bordered by manicured gardens that will delight kids and pets alike. Further highlights include a double carport accessed by remote roller door, water tank and garden shed. Additionally, ducted heating and evaporative cooling are yours for year-round comfort.
Ideally situated between the best of both Croydon and Kilsyth you are positioned among a plethora of local amenities, schools, kindergartens and parklands. Make a stylish entry into the property market or downsize without compromising on quality or convenience. Dont delay. Enquire today.

Description:
Family bliss with scope to renovate or recreate
Peacefully nestled in beautifully established gardens on a sizeable 823m2 allotment, this much-loved, impeccable weatherboard home awaits its next exciting chapter in a premium Heathmont pocket. Elevated with a delightful wisteria-entwined veranda, ideal to recline and appreciate the leafy neighbourhood vista. The home invites flexible light streamed living, welcoming a central lounge that emanates cosy warmth with a charming gas log fire. Progressing to a separate dining domain and versatile rumpus/4th bed with huge potential to expand the current kitchen, smartly equipped with electrical appliances, into an open plan family/meals domain. Leading outside to a covered alfresco deck and expansive manicured gardens for children and pets to roam, with private paved courtyard resting in dappled shade for extra entertaining.
Accommodating large and growing families, comprising 4 bedrooms, a study and 2 neat bathrooms (sep WCs) spread across two levels, master with floor to ceiling BIRs. The upper bathroom has been updated and fitted with a large shower and the ground floor bathroom is conveniently packaged with a laundry.
This is a superb opportunity to renovate and make this your own with the strong possibility to build dual side by side dwellings on such a large allotment (STCA). Further enhanced with stunning flowering gum bordering the property's fence line.
Additionally, representing a great investment opportunity to update and lease or live here and land bank for future yield.
Excellent proximity to kindergartens, schools incl Great Ryrie Primary and Aquinas College. Walk to Heathmont shops, cafes and services, Heathmont and HE Parker Reserves, The Nets and Dandenong Creek Trail. Minutes to Eastland, Aquanation, Heathmont rail station and freeway/Eastlink. Don't miss out on this unbeatable location!
Comfort enhanced by original cornices and double hung sash windows, ducted gas heating, hydronic heating, evaporative cooling, garden shed, single remote garage, workshop and storage area plus tandem carpark space/trailer storage area and ample OSP on driveway.

Description:
A Private Family Sanctuary
A private home of calmness and peace, this 900 sq m approx. property is a secure sanctuary with no shortage of space to extend and expand.
Dual crossovers culminating in a circular driveway welcome you onto the grounds, where lush gardens dotted with colourful, scented plants and the soothing sound of a pond with small water fountain set the scene.
Bathed in natural sunlight and boasting tranquil backyard vistas, the cosy, yet comfortable, open plan living and dining space keeps the whole family well-connected and is adorned with low maintenance floating floors that feature throughout. The smart and elegantly designed kitchen, bathroom and laundry flaunt contemporary style and excellent storage. The fully equipped kitchen featuring quality stainless steel appliances, plenty of food preparation and cooking space plus a lovely view to the front garden.
Three generously-sized bedrooms provide relaxed accommodation, all containing built-in wardrobes. Outside, the large backyard offers plenty of room to kick the footy or enjoy a game of cricket and hosts several established fruit trees and vegetable/herb patches. A covered pergola supplies a seamless connection between inside and outside, where you can entertain with family and friends throughout the seasons.
Further features include: a gas wall heater, split system air conditioner, linen press, solar hot water, a water tank, shed and workshop storage plus a double carport.
Set in a quiet, friendly neighbourhood that has the Mt Dandenong Ranges as its backdrop, it is an easy walk to bus stops, Elizabeth Bridge Reserve, Japara Community Centre, Churinga
Shopping Centre and Kilsyth Centenary Pool. Only minutes from several primary and secondary schools, Kilsyth Sports Centre, Mooroolbark Train Station and shopping precinct.
* Private family property resting on 900 sq m approx.
* Open plan living and dining room
* Smart and elegantly designed kitchen, bathroom and laundry
* Three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes
* Large backyard with pergola for year-round entertaining
* Heating and cooling
* Dual crossovers, a circular driveway and double carport
* Close to buses, reserves, recreational facilities, community centres, schools and shops

Description:
Superb court for renovation or development.
Superbly positioned in the bowl of a peaceful court, this character-filled home affords the shrewd buyer a lucrative opportunity with potential for development (subject to council approval). Occupying a spacious, 952m2 (approx.) block located within Neighbourhood Residential Zone - Schedule 6 (NRZ6), there's also scope to build a new home or renovate the existing three-bedroom dwelling.
Set behind a rustic timber fence, this charming weatherboard abode oozes a sense of yesteryear, immediately discerned when entering the relaxed living area boasting classic sash windows which allow ample light to flood the interior, in addition to decorative cornices. Furthermore, high ceilings throughout create a feeling of spaciousness.
The kitchen presents in original, functional condition, comprising an electric oven and stove, generous cupboard space and double pantry. The covered sitting area at the rear of the home provides a peaceful and private space to enjoy the great outdoors, or why not throw a snag on the barbie'?
Three sizable bedrooms are fitted with built-in robes and serviced by the main bathroom incorporating a shower over bath, large mirror and toilet. Additional benefits include; separate laundry, gas heater, air-conditioning, double garage and extra off-street parking. The spacious backyard is ideal for recreation, providing plenty of room for children and pets.
This premises boasts close connection to Kilsyth Shopping Centre, local bus stop, Kilsyth Recreation Reserve, Ruskin Park and Kilsyth Primary Schools, St. Peter Julian Eymard Primary School, Yarra Hills Secondary College, Kilsyth Centenary Pool, Mooroolbark Railway Station, libraries, hospitals and cafes. The home is also within close proximity of the EastLink freeway, which allows for fast and direct access to surrounding suburbs and Melbourne City Centre.
Avid lovers of good food and wine will also be well positioned to enjoy a choice selection of reputable restaurants, furthermore, nearby Yarra Valley beautifully showcases world-renowned wineries and fresh farm-direct produce, in addition to boutique shops and culinary experiences afforded by the Dandenong Ranges.
Whether you decide to develop, invest or nest, this history-enriched home has a bright future ahead.

Description:
Family Grandeur in the Golden Ridge Estate
Granting an impressive introduction into the Golden Ridge Estate, this grand 6-bedroom plus study home supplies a privileged life of space and convenience, within walking distance to Croydon Hill's premium schools and amenities.
Ultra-modern at the turn of the millennium, its show-stopping design has stood the test of time and now welcomes a new family to add their own flavour to it. It starts with a striking double door entry, where a tiled foyer with feature staircase and chandelier set the tone for the well-configured home. Tall ceilings with rose detailed cornices decorate a comfortable sun-bathed lounge, complemented by formal and casual dining areas plus a large rumpus. A central kitchen with stainless steel appliances services the zones; boasting generous cupboard, drawer and walk-in pantry storage. A study with built-in shelving is a great asset for those who work from home and there is a lone downstairs bedroom that would easily accommodate extended family or guests; containing built-in wardrobes, remote double garage access plus a neighbouring bathroom, powder room and laundry.
Upstairs, five additional bedrooms with built-in or walk-in wardrobes are divided on either side of the staircase and share the use of an indulgent spa bathroom and powder room. Two of the rooms, including the deluxe master suite, sharing front balcony access.
Outside, a private solar-heated swimming pool with accompanying barbeque and spa deck enjoys an easy flow through to the remote 4-car enclosed carport, which doubles as a large entertaining space.
Lavished with quality extras, it includes: ducted heating, vacuum and evaporative cooling, alarm system plus an abundance of storage throughout.
Located for lifestyle excellence, it accesses buses, trails, reserves, Good Shepherd and Croydon Hills Primary Schools, Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and McAdam Square on foot. A short commute to Croydon Main Street and Train Station, Eastland and EastLink.
